amendment.description: Amendments en bloc comprised of amendments numbered 22, 24, 26, 28, 30, 31, 33, 34, 40, 43, 47, 48, 49, and 50 printed in House Report 114-112. See page D541 of the Congressional Record of May 14, 2015 for description of en bloc amendments.
amendment.purpose: Amendments en bloc comprised of the following amendments offered as en bloc No. 2: 22, 24, 26, 28, 30, 31, 33, 34, 40, 43, 47, 48, 49, and 50 printed in House Report 114-112.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Thornberry amendments (A009) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendments en bloc (A009) offered by Mr. Thornberry.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Thornberry amendments (A009) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendments en bloc (A009) offered by Mr. Thornberry.
